text: 6.6: Ese 5.12; 5.17Gu guma kamthooŋ fara muuŋgi bigɨn mbe mbararagim, ana mba ŋamki fethɨgi bigi rɨgar kav khaŋ nzuai, “Gumgi gu mbigi, mbe wari won ŋaarir muunga, mben mba vhɨra tivgirga. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mben vhez, ra bavira ŋgargiap, nen vheza ndi. Mba vhez, ana mbe wit nda bisanera vhezɨrga o, bari nda bisaŋ mpuneni khegeneni ga vhezɨrga tuktɨgi. Ndu mben oriv khira gum wain karɨgir farfa thari. Maaŋ muuŋgip, mbe orivar mporiiŋ kɨv, mbe vhɨra wain mbɨ kɨrga.” 6.6 Mba gumgi, mbe rezi o, shɨshɨr vhɨgi ndi mbav, wit ndi mbav, shɨshɨr vhɨgir bari ndi mbav, mbe nta ndi sker ga tuav, ntan simtɨgi garav, nta ndi gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨɨm, mbe nta vhezi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mba hos ga perigi guma, ana bigir simtɨgi ndi tuav, ntan simtɨgi gari sker mbe suirigi.  Bari, ana parawa fara muuŋgi mba ma. (6.6)
